parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to the peripheral configuration structure.

memberdef.argsstring: (NRF_QDEC_Type *p_reg, uint32_t mask, uint8_t irq_priority, bool enable)
memberdef.name: nrfy_qdec_int_init

briefdescription.para: Function for initializing the specified QDEC interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be initialized.
Interrupt priority.
True if the interrupts are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for uninitializing the QDEC interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

briefdescription.para: Function for processing the specified QDEC events.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of events to be processed, created by NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

simplesect.para: Mask of events that were generated and processed. To be checked against the result of NRFY_EVENT_TO_INT_BITMASK().

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Pointer to store the accumulated transitions
Pointer to store the accumulated double transitions.

simplesect.para: nrf_qdec_enable Function for enabling QDEC.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_qdec_disable Function for disabling QDEC.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: nrf_qdec_enable_get Function for returning the enable state of QDEC.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: State of the register.
nrf_qdec_int_enable Function for enabling QDEC interrupts by mask.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_qdec_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_qdec_int_disable Function for disabling QDEC interrupts by mask.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_qdec_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: nrf_qdec_int_enable_check Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_qdec_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

The debouncing filter is disabled.
The debouncing filter is enabled.

briefdescription.para: Hardware access layer with cache and barrier support for managing the QDEC peripheral.
